reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Improving the status of disabled people in society

description.narrative: The project is realized in cooperation with Association of Central Asian Nations ?Julduz Organization of People with Disabilities of Uzbekistan (Bektemirov Tashkent region) and Art Centre Sanvikt. The project will be operated in Bektemirov and Hamza areas of Tashkent. These areas are populated by many poor and low-income families. Economic distress is an everyday family life where the breadwinner is unemployed single parent or in many cases a disabled woman. The country's infrastructure is out of date. Unem ployment and social services are mainly collapsed or disabled and poor. The deterioration of public services is in particular due to the poverty. The biggest challenge is the exclusion of these families from the social and economic problems of the society. The project development objective is to improve the social position of people with disabilities. This project will promote small businesses and related training and regional networking with other organizations and private sector.The main features of the pr oject are, support environment allowing training to invest into entrepreneurship development of responsible business create decent jobs and stimulate private sector and civil society partnerships networking. Functions will prevent the beneficiary families from exclusion from the society. The project will reinforce the existing structures and support the anti-poverty development.
